Package yaremax.com.sa_task_04_06.config

Class SecurityConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • yaremax.com.sa_task_04_06.config.SecurityConfig
  • @Configuration
public class SecurityConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the configuration for Spring Security. It configures the password encoder and authentication manager.
    Since:
    2024-10-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yaremax

    • Method Detail

      • passwordEncoder

        @Bean
public org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder()
        This method returns the password encoder bean. It uses the BCryptPasswordEncoder to hash passwords.
        Returns:
        the password encoder bean

      • authenticationManager

        @Bean
public org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager authenticationManager​(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.authentication.configuration.AuthenticationConfiguration config)
                                                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method returns the authentication manager bean. It uses the AuthenticationConfiguration to get the authentication manager.
        Parameters:
        config - the authentication configuration
        Returns:
        the authentication manager bean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

      • authenticationProvider

        @Bean
public org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider authenticationProvider​(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService userDetailsService,
                                                                                                 org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder)
        This method returns the authentication provider bean. It uses the DaoAuthenticationProvider to authenticate users. The user details service and password encoder are set for the authentication provider.
        Parameters:
        userDetailsService - the user details service
        passwordEncoder - the password encoder
        Returns:
        the authentication provider bean
